# B1 - German

Hallo! Wie geht's? In this course, you will learn the basics of the German language. You will learn how to introduce yourself, talk about your family, and describe your daily routine. You will also learn how to talk about your hobbies and interests, and how to make plans with friends. By the end of this course, you will be able to have simple conversations in German and understand basic texts. Viel Spa√ü!
